s1.name: JORAM licence
s1.p: JORAM license is a union of the JORAM Public License and the Open Public License (OPL 1.0) stating the general licensing policy of the software.
JORAM uses external code belonging to the Xerces and the Jakarta Apache projects, requesting the following licenses to be made available:
JORAM also uses code belonging to the javaCUP project, requesting this license to be made available.
